Champ Key Ability
E
6 90 Caliber Net Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow down her target and deal magic damage. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back 400 units. Caitlyn can also fire one long-ranged Headshot at netted targets.
7 A Harmless Scarecrow Fiddlesticks begins the game with an exclusive Scarecrow Effigy, which permanently occupies its trinket slot. Fiddlesticks can pretend to be an Effigy, after standing still for 2 seconds, adjusting its body into a scarecrow and extending its arm out to expose its lantern. Its health bar is also hidden to enemies while idle, similarly to an Effigy.

From level 6 onward, placing an Effigy also summons a demonic eyeball at the location that grants obscured vision of enemy units in the area for 6 seconds, which also reveals and disables enemy wards and stealthed traps.
E
0 Abduct Sylas whips out his chains in the target direction, dealing magic damage and stunning the first enemy hit, pulling himself towards them, and knocking them up for 0.35 seconds upon arrival.
E
0 Abscond Sylas dashes forward to the target location. For the next 3.5 seconds, Sylas may cast Abduct.
E
0 Abscond / Abduct Abscond: Sylas dashes forward to the target location. For the next 3.5 seconds, Sylas may cast Abduct.

Abduct: Sylas whips out his chains in the target direction, dealing magic damage and stunning the first enemy hit, pulling himself towards them, and knocking them up for 0.35 seconds upon arrival.
R
24 Absolute Zero Nunu & Willump sap heat from the area around them for up to 3 seconds, gaining a shield and slowing all nearby enemies. Enemies caught in the area when the channel ends are dealt massive damage.
1 Absolution Senna's basic attacks on-hit and damaging abilities on enemy champions apply Mist for 4 seconds, refreshed to 0.75 seconds if Senna starts winding up a basic attack on them. If Senna applies Mist to the same target twice, she collects it, dealing a percentage of target's current health as bonus physical damage, and making the target immune to further Mist applications for a few seconds.

Enemy units that die near Senna have a chance to spawn a Mist Wraith for 8 seconds, increased to 2 Mist Wraiths for epic monsters. Senna can basic attack or use Piercing Darkness or Dawning Shadow against a Mist Wraith to destroy it, gaining 3 gold and collecting its Mist.

Enemy champions, large and epic monsters are guaranteed to give a mist. Minions and lesser monsters that Senna kills have a 4.166% chance. Large minions that Senna doesn't kill are guaranteed, while lesser minions and lesser monsters that Senna doesn't kill have a 22% chance.

Each stack of Mist grants Senna bonus attack damage. For every 20 stacks, Senna also gains bonus range and critical strike chance. Upon exceeding 100% critical strike chance, Senna converts a percentage of the excess into life steal.

Senna's basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit and grant a percentage of the target's movement speed as bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds on-hit.
R
0 Abyssal Voyage Tahm Kench opens his maw, offering an ally a spot inside his belly. Once they jump in, or once Tahm Kench decides he's diving solo, he starts channeling, conjuring a whirlpool beneath him before diving in, reappearing a few seconds later at his target location.

Taking damage interrupts Abyssal Voyage, putting it on a 10 second cooldown.
E
1 Acceleration Gate Jayce deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the movement speed of all allies who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
R
9 Ace in the Hole Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
0 Adaptive Defenses Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to 20% of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for 1.5 seconds

This effect has a 20-10 second cooldown.
4 Adrenaline Rush Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his max health each second.
E
0 Aegis Assault ACTIVE: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction, channeling for 1.5 seconds as well as becoming slowed. Aegis Assault cannot be interrupted by crowd control. Aegis Assault can be recast after 0.3 seconds.

For the duration, Pantheon is invulnerable against non-turret damage dealt by enemies from the target direction, and deals physical damage over the duration in a cone to all enemies struck, reduced against minions.

At the end of the duration, Pantheon slams with his shield, dealing physical damage.

RECAST: Pantheon slams with his shield early.

Mortal Will Bonus: Pantheon gains 60% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds after slamming his shield.
W
2 Allure Evelynn curses the target champion or monster for 5 seconds. Evelynn's next basic attack or ability against the accursed slows them by 65%, as well as refunding Allure's mana cost if she triggers this before 2.5 seconds.

If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, she charms the target for instead, reducing the magic resist of champions or dealing bonus damage to monsters.
Q
13 Alpha Strike Master Yi leaps across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path and bonus damage to minions and monsters. This can critically strike for a percentage of Master Yi's AD.
Q
11 Ambush Twitch camouflages for a short period of time, gaining bonus movement speed while remaining stealthed. Upon leaving stealth, he will gain bonus attack speed.

Ambush's cooldown resets if an enemy dies while affected by deadly venom
0 An Acquired Taste Tahm Kench's basic attacks deal 4% of Tahm Kench's maximum health as bonus magic damage and apply a stack of An Acquired Taste to enemy champions for 5 seconds (stacks 3 times).

Against enemies with three stacks, his Tongue Lash and Devour are enhanced.
E
2 Apprehend Passive: Darius hones his axe, granting him armor penetration.

Active: Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook, pulling them to him while briefly granting vision in the area around the pull. Enemies pulled by Apprehend are slowed for a short duration.
Q
0 Aqua Prison Sends a bubble into the air towards a targeted area. When it lands, it deals magic damage to all enemies in the area of impact and encases them into bubbles. Enemies hit by the bubble are lifted into the air and stunned for a short duration before being dropped to the ground.
R
2 Arcane Barrage Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, which strikes after a 0.5 second delay dealing magic damage to enemies within a moderate area.
7 Arcane Mastery Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his bonus mana, and his maximum mana is increased by 5% per 100 ability power.
E
5 Arcane Shift Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing arrow which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
Q
4 Arcanopulse First Cast: Xerath starts charging, gradually increasing the range of Arcanopulse up to a maximum of 1400 while decreasing his movement speed by up to 50% over the next 1.5 seconds. While charging, Xerath cannot attack or use his other abilities. After 3 seconds, Arcanopulse cancels and half the mana cost is refunded.

Second Cast: After a brief cast time, Xerath fires a beam of energy in a line the deals magic damage to all enemies hit.
Q
1 Arctic Assault Sejuani charges forward, dealing magic damage and knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after colliding with an enemy champion.
W
0 Ardent Blaze Lucian fires a shot that explodes upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path, damaging enemies in a cross pattern and marking enemies hit for 6 seconds.

If Lucian or any of his allies damage a marked target with their basic attacks or abilities, Lucian gains a flat movement speed bonus for 1 second. This does not consume the mark.
W
7 Aria of Perseverance Active: Sona heals herself and a nearby allied champion with the lowest health percentage. The healing is increased by 0.5% for every 1% of the target's missing health.

Aura: Sona and allied champions tagged with Aria of Perseverance's aura are shielded up to 1.5 seconds.

Power Chord - Diminuendo: If this spell was last cast when Power Chord is ready, Power Chord will also reduce the target's damage output for 3 seconds.
W
1 Arise! Passive: Azir gains attack speed.

Active: Azir summons an untargetable Sand Soldier for 9 seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks instead of Azir, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. If multiple soldiers strike the same target, each soldier after the first deals 25% damage, and the soldiers can't attack structures.

Azir can store up to 2 Sand Soldiers at a time, but there is no hard limit on the number of Sand Soldiers that can be active on the field at once. Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast while within range of an enemy turret, and will expire instantly if Azir moves too far away.
R
2 Aspect Of The Cougar Nidalee transforms herself into a cougar.
0 Assassin's Mark Damaging a champion with an ability creates a ring around them. When the ring forms, Akali gains a burst of movement speed towards it. Once she crosses the ring, Akali gains another burst of movement speed towards the enemy.

Crossing the ring also empowers her kama, which increases the range and damage of her next attack.
E
2 Assassin's Path Talon vaults over the nearest structure or terrain in a target direction. The vault's speed is affected by Talon's movement speed. Talon cannot vault over the same section of terrain for a period of time.
R
5 Assault and Battery Vi targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for a short duration and dealing physical damage.

While charging, Vi is immune to crowd control and will knock aside enemies in the way, dealing the same damage to them. Vi will also remain Unstoppable for the duration of her uppercut.
W
4 Astral Infusion Soraka blesses a friendly unit, restoring its health. Astral Infusion cannot be self-cast, nor can it be cast if Soraka is below 5% of her maximum health.
E
0 Attract and Repel Rell forms a tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, which is disabled while the remaining cooldown is greater than 2.5 seconds. While the tether persists, the ally gains 10% bonus armor and bonus magic resistance.

ACTIVE: Rell binds herself and the allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast while the tether persists.

Rell erupts the tether to deal magic damage to all enemies between and around her and the bound ally, stunning affected enemies for 1 second.

Rell can self-target to dispel the current bind. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind. Attract and Repel will incur a 3-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally or self-targets, this does not disable the tether.
E
3 Audacious Charge Xin Zhao dashes to the target enemy's location, dealing magic damage to all enemies around the primary target and slowing them for 0.5 seconds. Audacious Charge's range is increased against Challenged targets.

Xin Zhao then gains bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

Xin Zhao cannot cast Wind Becomes Lightning while dashing, but he may still buffer it. Three Talon Strike and Crescent Guard can both be cast during the dash.
E
0 Audacity Qiyana dashes a fixed distance towards a target, dealing physical damage to them.
2 Backstab Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.
Q
8 Baleful Strike Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing magic damage to the first two enemies hit. For each target killed, Veigar gains 1 stack of Phenomenal Evil. This bonus is doubled if the target killed is a large minion or large monster.
Q
4 Bandage Toss Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
Q
5 Barrel Roll Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated again to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their movement speed slowed for 2 seconds. The damage increases based on the time the barrel sits out before exploding. The damage is reduced to 70 % against minions.
W
0 Bastion Passive: Bastion increases the armor of Taric and the champion he is linked with by a percentage of Taric's armor.

Active: Taric links with an ally, shielding them for a percentage of their maximum Health for 2.5 seconds. Bastion remains on Taric's ally until he recasts it onto another ally, or the two move far enough apart to break their link.

While linked, all of Taric's abilities are simultaneously cast from both Taric and his linked ally, though the effects do not stack.
E
0 Battle Dance Rakan leaps to an ally champion, shielding them for 3 seconds. Battle Dance can be re-cast for 5 seconds at no cost.
5 Battle Fury Tryndamere's Critical Strike chance increases as he becomes more wounded.
W
2 Battle Roar Rengar lets out a battle roar, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, increased against monsters, and healing himself from the damage he's taken in the last 1.5 seconds. This is increased versus monsters.

EMPOWERED ACTIVE: Battle Roar's magic damage is modified and additionally cleanses Rengar of all crowd control.
E
3 Bear Stance Udyr gains a burst of movement speed for a few seconds. While in Bear Stance, Udyr's basic attacks stun the target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
Q
0 Beartrap on a Rope Mounted: Kled hurls a beartrap tied to a piece of rope forward in a line, dealing damage to all enemies it passes through and attaching itself to the first enemy champion or large monster hit. Minions take 50% increased damage.

If Kled remains within a slowly decreasing radius of his target for 1.75 seconds, he pulls them towards him, slowing them for 1.5 seconds, reducing all healing on them by 60% for 5 seconds and dealing bonus damage.
Q
0 Beartrap on a Rope / Pocket Pistol Beartrap on a Rope (mounted): Kled hurls a beartrap tied to a piece of rope forward in a line, dealing damage to all enemies it passes through and attaching itself to the first enemy champion or large monster hit. Minions take 50% increased damage.

If Kled remains within a slowly decreasing radius of his target for 1.75 seconds, he pulls them towards him, slowing them for 1.5 seconds, reducing all healing on them by 60% for 5 seconds and dealing bonus damage.

Pocket Pistol (dismounted): Kled sprays a hail of five pellets in a cone, dealing damage to all enemies that intercept the pellets, and dashing in the opposite direction. Enemies hit take only 20% bonus damage per pellet beyond the first.

Each pellet that hits an enemy champion restores 5 Courage.

Kled periodically stores ammo, up to a maximum of 2 stored at once. Kled will store ammo even while mounted.
E
0 Beat Drop Seraphine fires a heavy soundwave in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies struck, reduced against minions, and slowing them for a second.

Enemies that are already slowed are also rooted for the same duration. Enemies that are immobilized or grounded are also stunned for the same duration.
R
2 Behind Enemy Lines After channeling for 2 seconds, Quinn calls upon Valor to assist her. While together, the two have massively increased movement speed from all sources and can cast Skystrike by taking an offensive action or reactivating Behind Enemy Lines.
W
1 Bellows Breath Ornn becomes unstoppable and marches in the target direction. Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage. The final bout of flame will apply Brittle.
1 Berserker Rage Olaf gains 075% bonus attack speed (depending on missing health).
W
0 Biggest Snowball Ever! Willump starts rolling a snowball that grows in size and speed. Crashing the snowball into a wall, enemy champion, or large monster damages and knocks up nearby enemies. Reactivating the ability sends the snowball forward in straight line, damaging and knocking up minions in addition to champions and monsters.
Q
0 Binding Eclipse Aphelios expunges all enemies affected by Gravitum's slow, dealing magic damage and rooting them for 1 second.

Each use of the ability will cost 10 Moonlight + 60 Mana.
W
9 Bio-Arcane Barrage Active: While active, Kog'Maw gains bonus range and his attacks deal bonus magic damage based off the enemy's maximum health.
E
7 Black Shield Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and preventing disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
R
4 Blade of the Exile Riven's sword reforms, giving her a bonus 20% Attack Damage, extended range on her damaging abilities and basic attacks for 15 seconds. She is also granted the ability to use Wind Slash once for the duration.
Q
0 Blade of the Ruined King Viego's basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit. The bonus damage has a minimum threshold and is capped against monsters.

Additionally, Viego's damaging abilities apply a mark to enemies for 4 seconds. Viego's next basic attack against a marked target consumes the mark to strike twice, with the second strike dealing physical damage and healing him for the post-mitigation damage dealt, increased against monsters. The second strike is affected by critical strike modifiers and, while not under possession, it applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

ACTIVE: Viego thrusts his blade in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, increased depending on critical strike chance, and bonus physical damage against monsters.

Blade of the Ruined King's passive remains under possession.
W
0 Blade Whirl Samira slashes around herself twice over 1.25 seconds, the first slash occurring immediately and the second being performed 0.25 seconds before the duration ends, each one dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

Samira destroys all hostile non-turret projectiles that enter or are in her vicinity during this time.

Samira cannot attack nor cast Flair during Blade Whirl. Casting Inferno Trigger will end Blade Whirl early without performing the second slash.
3 Blade's End Talon's abilities wound champions for a short duration, stacking up to three times. When Talon basic attacks a fully wounded target, they bleed for a large amount of physical damage over time. Talon's abilities will also wound all monsters for 120% damage.
W
0 Blade's Reach After a short delay in which he can't perform any other actions, Kayn performs an upwards sweep with his scythe, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line and slowing them.
W
0 Blade's Reach: Rhaast After a short delay in which he can't perform any other actions, Kayn performs an upwards sweep with his scythe, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line, knocking them up and slowing them.
W
0 Blade's Reach: Shadow Assassin After a short delay, Kayn conjures a living shadow at his casting position that performs an upwards sweep with its scythe, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line and slowing them.
E
0 Bladecaller Xayah recalls all her Feathers, dealing physical damage to enemies they strike on their way toward her. Minions take 50% damage. Each Feather to strike a target deals 10% less damage than the last, with a minimum of 10% damage. Enemies struck by at least 3 Feathers are rooted for 1.5 seconds.
Q
2 Bladesurge Passive: Enemy champions and monsters hit by Flawless Duet and Vanguard's Edge's initial barrage are marked for 5 seconds.

Active: Irelia dashes to the target enemy, dealing physical damage, applying on-hit effects and healing herself. Bladesurge deals increased damage to minions.

Bladesurge's cooldown is refunded if the target was marked or dies to Bladesurge.
E
0 Bladework Fiora gains increased attack speed and attack range on her next two basic attacks. The first cannot crit but slows her target, while the second is guaranteed to crit.
3 Blast Shield Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
4 Blaze Brand's abilities set his targets ablaze for 4 seconds, dealing a percentage of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds as magic damage. Abilities used on an ablazed target are empowered and apply other stacks of Blaze while also refreshing the duration of the previous ones. A target can have up to 3 Blaze stacks at the same time. The damage per tick against monsters is increased. Killing an enemy that is ablazed restores mana.

After reaching 3 stacks on large monsters or enemy champions, an area is marked around the target which grants sight in its radius and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all the stacks. All enemies struck are dealt a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage and have a stack of Blaze applied to them. The explosion will still trigger if the target dies to the ability reaching 3 stacks or during the delay.

Brand cannot stack Blaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the past 4 seconds.
W
4 Blighted Quiver Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum health.

Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow deals additional damage based on the target's missing HP. Damage is increased by up to 50% based on charge time.
Q
1 Blinding Assault Quinn sends Valor forth in a straight line skillshot. Valor stops at the first enemy struck, marking it as Vulnerable and damaging all nearby enemies.
Q
5 Blinding Dart Teemo shoots a dart at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and blinding them for a short duration. The blind duration is doubled against minions and monsters.
W
0 Blood Hunt Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 25% health, he frenzies and these bonuses increase.
W
0 Blood Rush Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
Q
4 Bloodlust Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat. Whenever Tryndamere kills a unit or critically strikes, he temporarily gains increased attack damage and critical damage.
Q
0 Blooming Blows PASSIVE: Lillia gains a Prance stack for 5 seconds whenever she hits at least 1 enemy with her abilities, refreshing up to 5 stacks. Stacks are lost by one every second. Each stack grants Lillia bonus movement speed.

ACTIVE: Lillia swings her censer around her, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit within the outer edge of the area additionally take the same amount as bonus true damage.
Q
0 Blooming Burst Neeko propels a seed into a target area, which blooms after a short delay, dealing magic damage to enemies within.

If the burst kills an enemy unit or damages a champion or large monster, it will bloom again after a short delay, dealing magic damage. This cannot happen more than twice per Blooming Burst.
E
3 Body Slam Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for 1 second.

Body Slam's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.
E
5 Bola Strike Rengar throws a bola in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them for a few seconds.

EMPOWERED ACTIVE: Bola Strike's physical damage is modified and roots its target for a few seconds seconds.
Q
0 Bone Skewer Pyke either stabs and slows an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.
Q
3 Boomerang Blade Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
Q
0 Boomerang Throw Gnar throws his boomerang forward in a line, dealing physical damage to all enemies it passes through and also slowing the first enemy hit for 2 seconds. Enemies beyond the first take only 50% damage.

Upon reaching maximum range or striking an enemy, the boomerang will slowly come to a stop before travelling back toward Gnar in fixed direction. If Gnar catches his boomerang, Boomerang Throw's cooldown is reduced by 40%.
Q
4 Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss Boomerang Throw: Gnar throws his boomerang forward in a line, dealing physical damage to all enemies it passes through and also slowing the first enemy hit for 2 seconds. Enemies beyond the first take only 50% damage.

Upon reaching maximum range or striking an enemy, the boomerang will slowly come to a stop before travelling back toward Gnar in fixed direction. If Gnar catches his boomerang, Boomerang Throw's cooldown is reduced by 40%.

Boulder Toss: Gnar throws a boulder that stops when it hits an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing all enemies hit.

0 Rage Gene While in Mini Gnar form, he gains bonus movement speed, attack range, attack speed and attack speed growth.

Mini Gnar generates Rage over a few seconds upon dealing or receiving damage. Against champions and non-champions, basic attacks and Boomerang Throw instantly generates Rage. Boomerang Throw can only generate Rage once per cast, and grants Rage based on the first enemy hit. Gnar's Rage decays if he has not dealt or taken damage in the last several seconds.

At maximum Rage, casting an ability or after a few seconds will transform him into Mega Gnar for several seconds, during which Gnar's Rage depletes. Afterwards Gnar returns to Mini Gnar and is too tired to generate Rage for several seconds. Gnar retains his current percentage health when he returns to Mini Gnar.

Mega Gnar has different abilities, although they share Mini Gnar's ability cooldowns. While in Mega Gnar form, he loses all Mini Gnar's buffs and instead has increased base AD, health, armor and magic resistance. Gnar restores health equal to the increase.

Rek'Sai's tunnels last for up to 10 minutes and can have up to 8 pairs of Tunnel Entrances active on the map at the same time. Enemy champions can destroy a tunnel by standing on either entrance for 1.5 seconds. Destroying a tunnel once Rek'Sai is already enroute will not hinder her.

All enemies struck by the returning blade briefly suffer reduced movement speed when moving away from Shen.

Akali's basic attacks and abilities will break the invisibility for a short duration.

The marked section of Twilight Shroud's will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.

If Sion collides with an enemy champion or terrain, charges for the full 8 seconds, or recasts the ability, he will slam the ground with earth-shattering force, dealing physical damage and knocking up enemies nearby enemies, while slowing enemies further away. The damage and crowd control duration increase over the first few seconds of the charge, capping at 200% damage and 1.75 seconds respectively.

Yuumi can switch among her teammates without a cooldown. If Yuumi re-activates the ability without a valid target, she will detach from her ally and dash up to 250 units in the target direction. Yuumi also detaches automatically if the ally she is attached to dies.

R
Absolute Zero
Range: 575 Cooldown: 110 / 100 / 90 Cost: 100
Nunu & Willump sap heat from the area around them for up to 3 seconds. Moving ends Absolute Zero's effects immediately, and the area is invisible if the duo is not revealed.

The duo gains a shield for 65 / 75 / 85 (+150% of ability power) (+30 / 40 / 50% bonus health) while channeling that refreshes each second, and enemies within the frosted area are slowed by 50-95% (based on channel time).

Enemies caught in the frozen area when the channel ends or is interrupted take up to 625 / 950 / 1275 (+250% of ability power) magic damage (based on channel time).
